betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Suppressing distortion effects means maintaining your distortion, but not allowing it to materialize so that the distortion doesn't kick in. 

The most common, is the use of purifying bath salts, which is also very simple to use, all you need to do is throw the purifying bath salts into a compartment of non-flowing water, after which the puddle of water will turn into purifying water. 

When you come into contact with the Water of Purification, if you don't have a Twisted Guardian effect, then the puddle of Purified Water will be consumed and grant you a 30min Twisted Guardian effect, during which time you won't be able to trigger Twisted Effects, but Twisted Effects that have already occurred won't be removed immediately.
